entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • regression on binary-trees regression in 5.0 #60659
  • System.Color - Blazor WASM local machine vs. Azure AppService #60655
  • SocketsHttpHandler: Improve handling of failed connection attempts #60654
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6 RC2 SDK: runtimeconfig.json wrong version for self-contained netcoreapp3.1 #60651
  • Mono ignores non-public custom attributes in dynamic assemblies #60650
  • Mono ARM64 JIT inconsistent with sign-extension #60649
  • Windows x86 CoreCLR assert failure: ExecutionManager::IsManagedCode(GetControlPC(pCF->GetRegisterSet())) #60648
  • StressTestDeepNestingOfConcat takes a lot longer on NonBacktracking than other engines #60645
    7.0.0
  • Regression from 5.0: HttpClient does not retry HTTP/1.1 request if TCP connection is closed #60644
  • [API Proposal]: System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeCompatibilityAttribute.DisableRuntimeMarshalling #60639
    7.0.0
  • [android] interpreter does not run Java/C# object finalizers in some cases #60638
    6.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder cannot deserialize json array to dictionary #60630
    Future
  • Cookie doesn't get replaced in CookieContainer #60628
  • Dll import tests failing with jit assert on arm64: op2->TypeIs(TYP_LONG) #60624
  • Match_Timeout_Loop_Throws test is not timing out with RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #60623
    7.0.0
  • [arm64] These benchmarks are faster on Rosetta-x64 than on native arm64 #60616
  • Regressions in Benchstone.BenchI.EightQueens #60629
  • 1ES Pools often run out of space #60610
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CtorFromCollection<String> #60627
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in SeekUnroll #60626
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_BigInteger #60625
  • Enable using live ref pack in source generator unit tests #60605
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Linq.Parallel.Tests.ParallelQueryCombinationTests.SequenceEqual_OperationCanceledException(operation: SelectMany-ResultSelector) #60604
  • Test tracing/eventactivityidcontrol/eventactivityidcontrol/eventactivityidcontrol.sh #60602
  • StopTheHostException should be made public to be dealt with gracefully #60600

Closed

  • [macOS-arm64] 233 System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.Tests failing on CoreCLR #49104
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json cannot parse int if it looks like a float `123.0` #40596
    Future
  • Switch expression choosing implicit conversion over exact match #60653
  • JsonConverter precedence differs from Newtonsoft and may be unintuitive #1130
    Future
  • HttpClient Content-Type Header #60513
    7.0.0
  • Request: System.Text.Json Serialization with Opt-In #30180
    Future
  • Azure Function: Unable to load System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #60516
  • RuntimeIdentifierTests.VerifyOSRid started failing on macOS ARM64 #60341
  • System.Text.Json: don't emit null values when serializing collections #682
    Future
  • StressTestDeepNestingOfLoops test takes a very long time on RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #60622
    7.0.0
  • dotnet publish -c Release fail with <RunAOTCompilation>true</RunAOTCompilation> and <BlazorWebAssemblyLazyLoad #60479
    6.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] Converter-level conditional serialization #36275
    Future
  • Feature request: Enable Websocket ping-pong and timeout #60620
    7.0.0
  • List<T> to Support Pop() #31828
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: Add JsonReaderState.LineNumber and BytePositionInLine Property #50629
    7.0.0
  • Use a non-backtracking NFA/DFA regex engine where possible #18614
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: RegexOptions.Constrained #57891
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ExportTests.ExportDoesNotCorruptPrivateKeyMethods #60603
  • Build error 'The following files are missing entries in the templated manifest' #60526
  • Way to reduce memory usage for long-running app on Linux. #60455

PullRequests

Created

  • Cleanup workloads for testing logic #60652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix Regex outerloop tests for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #60647
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Prototype mark overflow fix for regions #60646
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Don't special case "Experimental" projects #60641
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Share TypedReference managed code between CoreCLR and Mono #60636
    area-System.Runtime
  • Tweak workload build to use _GenerateMsiVersionString target #60634
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60633
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add a COMPlus variable to throw runtime exception on JIT asserts #60631
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Attempt to fix observed AV in mark_through_cards_for_segments #60617
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ensure outgoing arg space for stack cookie fail fast #60615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Port InformationalVersion fix to Mono corelib #60614
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [hackathon] [testonly] ValueArray - a compliment type to the Span, which owns its data without indirections. #60608
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [DllImportGenerator] Don't generate a full stub body when the body does nothing #60601
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Don't special case "Experimental" projects #60643
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Fix stable builds for some transport packages #60635
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix a few more ASAN-exposed issues #60262
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Re-enable tests that are no longer failing #60609
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [mono][llvmonly] Optimize virtual calls/rgctx fetches in gsharedvt methods. #60491
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Improve FileProviders.Physical tests to reuse existing helper types #58155
    test enhancement, area-Extensions-FileSystem, 7.0.0
  • Disable CounterSample_Calculate_CalculateCounterSample on Win10 ARM64 #60611
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Move 2 Drawing APIs that are not implemented in netfx to netcoreapp #60599
    area-System.Drawing
  • Update IntelliSense package #60487
    documentation, * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • [HTTP] Add logging of request and response #60418
    area-System.Net.Http
  • DotNetHost packages are not created during source-build #60575
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/6.0] Enforce scatter/gather file I/O Windows API requirements et. al. #58423
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Update IntelliSense package #60621
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move NoInt32OverflowInTheBufferingLogic to OuterLoop #60606
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Update mac installers location string #60499
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/6.0] Update mac installers location string #60500
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/6.0] Use custom error message when running out of syncblocks #60592
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • fix rid processing on macOS #60494
    area-Host
  • Maui Android Size on Disk Integration #60425
  • Fix argument for continuing on error for spmi replay pipeline #60594
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make bounds check nodes ordinary binary opers #59963
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix interaction of GDV and boxing #60355
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add managed implementation of Math.ILogB and MathF.ILogB #56236
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #60607
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Avoid cached int[] in Console on Unix #60411
    area-System.Console
  • Apply style changes to System.Text.Json #60509
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Disable Linux arm64 llvm full aot runtime tests #60576
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Build error 'The following files are missing entries in the templated manifest' #60580
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • Avoid unnecessary cached char[] in StringParsingHelpers #60409
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] Stabilize for RTM #60294
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0

Updated

  • [llvmonly] Optimize delegate invocation. #60593
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Make unit tests for DllImportGenerator build/run in CI #60598
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Implement `GT_AND_NOT` for ARM/ARM64 #59881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Convert concatenation string to interpolation for System.Private.Xml #60057
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Enable ASAN for CoreCLR #54580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add documentation on how VN numbers memory #60476
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Loop Alignment support for Arm64 #60135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove _validator field from ObjectCollection #59589
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Do not throw StackOverflow exception from `ChangeToken.OnChange` #60198
    area-Extensions-Primitives
  • [release/6.0] DotNetHost packages are not created during source-build #60577
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fallback to x64 directory if running x64 process on win-arm64 apphost #59890
    area-Host
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] encapsulate emscripten js runtime #60504
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • API Implementation: Add Indexer to Vectors #60517
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • always populate TargetHostName on SslStream #60589
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60364
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0] Create a parent CMake project for building app bundles on CI #59154
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/5.0] Remove duplicate entries from dotnet --info #60496
    Servicing-approved, area-Host
  • Fix condition for dependOnEvaluatePaths for runtime-community pipeline #60552
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Android] Skip/tweak some System.Runtime tests #60569
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add reciprocal and SinCos methods to IFloatingPoint #59521
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • FileSystem.Unix: improve CopyFile. #59695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add limited support for backtracking Regex single char loops to simplified code gen #60385
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • issue 56835 make ordered dictionary kv collection implement i list #60060
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Process: throw ArgumentNullException when ArgumentList contains a null. #59562
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, Future
  • fix https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/60282 #60283
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder` #57418
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix issue #60543 #60544
    area-System.Xml
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [hackathon] `ValueArray` - a compliment type to the `Span`, which owns its data without indirections. #60519
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use less calls for MoveDirectory #58869
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Could not compile program with NativeAOT #1659

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix escaping of NativeLibrary paths #1664

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: rewrite local vars to shadow stack #1658

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • xunit - Vulnerabilities #22178
  • Project cannot be run with the X64 architecture using the .NET RC 2 SDK for Apple Silicon / ARM64 #22176
  • .NET Core SDK installed via snap not working on Raspberry Pi OS? #22167
  • [Loc]With net6 RTM SDK installed on locale OS, overtranslate issue occurs when runing "dotnet publish -r win-x64" in CLI. #22166

Closed

  • Support rolling back workload manifests even if Visual Studio installed workloads #21766
    6.0.1xx
  • dotnet 5.0.400 build stops after GetCopyToPublishDirectoryItems step on macOS #19656
  • I am unable to get this to work on my Mac (MacBook Air M1, macOS 11.6). #22175
  • repeat sdks, runtimes list #22118

PullRequests

Created

  • Move all shared workload options to install command #22190
    Area-Workloads
  • Argument BC(--r/--a), add support for `--arch` #22180
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Enable rollback support for manifest MSIs #22159
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0.1xx][blazorwasm] Fix publishing project with lazy loaded assembly #22145
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Update System.CommandLine version #21321
    Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #22146
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: ReadOnlySpan initialization from static data #5295
  • [Proposal]: Only Allow Lexical Keywords in the Language #4460
    Working Set
  • Open issue: non-negative assumption should apply to both Count and Length #5137
  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Cancel Async Functions Without Throw #4565
  • [Proposal]: Raw string literal #4304
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Create non-record-primary-constructors.md #5306
  • Remove separate lambda-attributes.md proposal #5301

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] Unify Razor/Roslyn LCS implementations #57245
  • Formatting of list-patterns on multiple lines is incorrect #57244
  • [LSP] Always create lsp misc files and resolve rps regression #57243
  • Allow for a way to ensure some source generators run before / after others #57239
  • Flaky integration tests with 17.0p5 #57237
  • Provide a shortcut for navigation to base types #57236
  • KeyNotFoundException from FindReferencesSearchEngine.ProcessDocumentAsync #57235
  • Remove apphost from `csi` for source-build to avoid prebuilt dependency on a 3.1 apphost pack #57233
  • Renaming file(with type) freezes UI #57232
  • Pulling member up does not copy documentation #57230
  • Add a "add breakpoint" in the context menu when clicking on a margin of an overridden member #57229
  • Emit tests are approaching the string limit #57226

Closed

  • Disallow null-suppression operator `!` applies to value type contexts #57142
    17.1
  • Semantic clarification & document highlight gold bar #57246
  • How to target specific framework/core versions when building with CSharpCompilation #57075
  • Suggestion for unnamed symbols completion: Offer completion for await #52289
    Backlog
  • Nullability mismatch from a switch expression cannot be suppressed directly and must be suppressed on every arm #52143
    17.1.P1
  • [ArPow] Incorporate source-build ArPow patches #55553
    17.1
  • Convert to file-scoped namespace refactoring isn't applicable at all levels #57198
  • VisualStudioActiveDocumentTracker doesn't handle all element IDs #57203
    17.1
  • clicking on a specific error (CS5001) fails to reach the on-line search - #56318
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57240
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add Emit2 test project #57238
    Area-Compilers
  • handle null project paths in solution #57234
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Add semantic tokens benchmarks + improve edit algorithm #57231
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Add ServiceHub core host integration test CI #57228
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57242
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #57095
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57241
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ensure new files are formatted based on the right language version #57119
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unnecessary Symbol type checks #57181
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #57227
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57224
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57215
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Honor suppression on switch expression #57204
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.1.P1
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement for compiler analyzer execution #56844
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build, Next
  • Fix VisualStudioActiveDocumentTracker to handle VSSELELEMID.SEID_Wind… #57206
    Area-IDE, Next
  • List patterns: Use the base node to share code #57207
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57248
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Implement 'Enable nullable reference types' refactoring #57200
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, 17.1.P1
  • Interpolated string handler IOperation support #56276
    Area-Analyzers
  • List patterns: main IDE scenarios and AddRequiredParens #53850
    Area-IDE, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Implement an LspWorkspaceManager and modify how we fork documents in LSP. #57140
    Area-IDE
  • Move skeleton ref caching to ProjectStates #57158
    Area-IDE
  • Fix for "Function pointer invocation has "None" IOperation" #57191
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Adding some additional tests and asserts #57164
    Area-IDE
  • Options refactoring #57139
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Compute val escape for extended property patterns #57211
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Extended Property Patterns
  • Allow newlines in the holes inside interpolated strings #56853
    Area-Compilers, Compiler.Next
  • List patterns: IOperation #56008
    Area-Compilers
  • [hackathon] Support for ValueArray in C# escape analysis. #57218
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: counterexample for non-exhaustive switch expressions #55327
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers
  • Codefix for CS1591: Add ///<inheritdoc/> #57004
    Area-IDE, Community
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements (Part 1) #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Fix ServiceHub Core host option #57223
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.0
  • Always set BuildingInsideVisualStudio when loading MSBuild workspace #57219
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor disconnect #37691
  • This is a matter of how your web server is configured, not about Blazor WebAssembly. #37689
  • Session Value lost only in Chrome after AJAX post #37687
  • Startup improvement: fortunes #37685
  • Add `msftbot` comment when `Needs: Author Feedback` label is added #37683
    Next sprint planning
  • [SPA] Add Connection: Keep-Alive header to the proxied requests #37681
    .NET 7 Planning
  • .net6 minimal API test config overrides only apply after app has been built #37680
  • Consider making RoutingMarkerService public #37679
  • Blazor WASM: Asynchronous calls to JSRuntime causes page re-rendering #37678
  • Cyrillic becomes questions ����� #37677
  • startup.cs missing from ProjectTemplate files #37674
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_ef, mvc #37673
  • [Discussion] Announcement: Minimal API renames in RC1 and RC2 #37671
    Discussions
  • Update RZ9992 Diagnostic Error Link #37669
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Enable Ability to Host Blazor Applications in Microsoft, Apple, and Google Play Stores #11082
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server fail build when RuntimeIdentifier present #13245
    Backlog
  • apidescription.client somtimes fails during build #19493
    Backlog
  • dotnet-openapi produces uncompilable swaggerClient #21656
    Backlog
  • JSON Patch replace entire object in root path throws error #17927
    Backlog
  • Breakdown of the time taken by IActionResultExecutor #33778
    Backlog
  • JsonPatch - Tests on empty string throws exception #28019
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add Connected Service Generation doesnt handle filepaths that need to be quoted #26987
    Backlog
  • WebHostBuilderExtensions.UseSolutionRelativeContentRoot cannot find the solution file in the root directory #33363
  • Flaky Test: AppOfflineDroppedWhileSiteStarting_SiteShutsDown_InProcess #33288
    Next sprint planning
  • [Test failure] HttpsClientCert_GetCertInformation #29068
    Next sprint planning
  • Windows test job failure due to BasicTestApp publish/trimming #35429
    6.0.0
  • Produce a standalone blazor-devserver tool #17528
    Backlog
  • Components added by a source generator work in code, but not in markup #32172
    Backlog
  • Update the generated web.config file for published standalone Blazor WebAssembly apps to include URL rewrite rules for using the precompressed files #21465
    Backlog
  • Link is dead #37675
    Backlog
  • Blazor WebAssembly debugging improvements #27301
    Backlog
  • Blazor hasDebuggingEnabled set when "Start without debugging" in VS #24623
    Backlog
  • Document/implement solutions for supporting debugging in in-browser experience #24753
    Backlog
  • Stopping blazor debugging quickly after starting it orphans the session #26414
    Backlog
  • Blazor WASM: Unboud breakpoint #25635
    Backlog
  • Blazor browser crashes #25519
    Backlog
  • Add support for launching DebugProxy from VS #22589
    Backlog
  • Review the design of JsonPatch types #8615
    Backlog
  • Analyzer for RCL + MVC #16971
    Backlog
  • Blazor browser developer tool extension, that removes the "Blazor comments" in "Elements" tab #13310
    Backlog
  • Blazor dev tools browser extension #5517
    Backlog
  • Improvements to Swagger generation #4854
    Backlog
  • Identify ASP.NET specific components which will be available through super-scaffolder #27339
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio Intellisense Notification of potential reference upgrade is needed. #25830
    Backlog
  • IRazorSourceChecksumMetadata and the RuntimeViewCompiler #27139
    Backlog
  • Blazor Virtualize - Get currently displayed/rendered indices and single index updates? #30561
    Backlog
  • Feature Request: Virtualize component index information #31835
    Backlog
  • Improve CORS documentation #21541
    Backlog
  • If it is described in razor tag notation, no compile error will occur even if the obsolete attribute is specified. #30967
    Backlog
  • Blazor: support linked `.razor` files from different path #21090
    Backlog
  • ASP.NET Project containing any server-side Blazor components is compiled twice #17742
    6.0.0
  • Getting Component Attributes Do Not Support Complex Content (mixed c# and markup) #29121
    Backlog
  • Build performance improvements for Blazor #22566
    Backlog
  • 3.0 SDK copies Properties/launchSettings.json to output directory #14799
    Backlog
  • Rzc should respect WarningsAsErrors #12814
    Backlog
  • Named Tuples On RenderFragments Not Working and Razor intellisense is holding onto reference #36229
    Backlog
  • [Blazor] RenderFragment with named tuple parameter is not working #33100
    .NET 7 Planning
  • HtmlHelper.Editor method doesn't correctly render properties of an object inside a collection #16689
    Backlog
  • Question: How do you generate razor code without additional attributes? #14231
    Backlog
  • MultiSelectList should be inter-operable with SelectListItem with a nested SelectListGroup #12948
    Backlog
  • Provide FileVersionProvider Async Option #12466
    Backlog
  • Compiled Views are not found when path contains %3A (URL Encoded colon) #11851
    Backlog
  • INPUT tag helper for DateTime (.NET Core 3) #10992
    Backlog
  • Add support for CSP Nonce to the PrerenderTagHelper #9416
    Backlog
  • asp-fallback CSS tag helper affected by Application Insights JavaScript #8889

  • SelectListItem interface #7662
    Backlog
  • AnchorTagHelper: automatically add active class #7049
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Essentials in shared project #3035
  • [Bug] BlazorWebView not provide "MediaPlaybackRequiresUserGesture" #3033
  • [Bug] [Catalyst] Errors loading Custom Fonts. #3032
  • Dependency injection of ILogger not working when using Serilog in Maui Blazor app [Bug] #3031
  • [Bug] Shell FlyoutBackgroundColor property has no effect #3030
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] Shell BackgroundColor in UWP, MAC and iOS #3029
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] Scroll view not working correctly after October 12, 2021 release #3028
  • [Bug] Custom namespace schemas not working #3027
  • [Bug] [Android] [MAUI Blazor] Crash on Android 5 device/emulator #3023
  • [Bug] Rectangle types issues #3022

Closed

  • [Bug] [WinUI] Changing Window size causes "A cycle occurred while laying out the GUI." Crashes App. #2637
  • [Bug] [Android] ScrollView Padding not being set. #2634
  • [Bug] Layout Cycle Detected on WinUI when using Padding on a ScrollView #2755
  • [Bug] Maui App gets displayed in a strange way when deployed to IPad #3034
  • Build warnings for .NET MAUI Blazor app: @(Content) build action is not supported #2831
  • [Bug] Installing MAUI workload fails #3021
  • How to create Device Tests for Maui projects #2879
  • Cannot see Maui Project template vs2022 Preview #3020
  • [Bug] Label TextTransform doesn't work #2969

PullRequests

Created

  • Add -NoProfile switch for PowerShell commands #3036
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Customize Android and Windows ScrollView behavior to include Padding inside of scroll area #2959
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • Fix Blazor project Android warnings and set WarningsAsErrors=true on template builds #2982
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Set the min version of windows to 1809/10.0.17763 #3019
  • Remove references to an "app window" #3003
    area/desktop 🖥️, area/controls 🎮
  • Update GitHub issue templates to use updated labels, syntax #3015
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Apply TextTransform for Controls Label #2985
    area/controls 🎮

Updated

  • Specify the minimum versions of the platforms #2905
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Handler]Collectionview handler for iOS #2156
  • Remove IPlatformServices.GetHash #2707
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • Implement .NET 6 features for templates. #3018
    area/templates 📄
  • [X] Incremental SourceGenerator #2772
    area/Xaml </>, do-not-merge
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
  • [Android] Update SecureStorage to use EncryptedSharedPreferences #2807

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unneccessary schema name parameter generated in rc.2 migrations code generator #26406
  • Exception when creating new migration after updating from 6.0-rc.1 to 6.0-rc.2 #26405
  • InMemory provider and required properties #26404
  • when i use EF.CompileAsyncQuery((DbContext db, Func<TEntity, bool> filter) => db.Set<TEntity>().Where(filter)),there has been an error #26402

Closed

  • Impove unsupported type exception #26341
    7.0.0
  • Throw better error message for owned entity without owner can be attached to context #21954
    7.0.0
  • Improve Exception message: Cannot bind to constructor parameters #19383
    7.0.0
  • Indicate explicitly in constructor binding exception that entity type instances cannot be injected #17123
    7.0.0
  • IAsyncEnumerable support #26392
  • How to access the Shadow-ForeignKey-properties of an EntityEntry #26381
  • Table splitting: Make HasColumnName optional #26345
  • EF CORE 5.0 ThenInclude OrderBy, uses PK before OrderBy field, rendering it useless #26343
    6.0.0-preview5
  • EF CLI using ToTable(null) causes migration to drop non-existing column #26331
  • Unable to load shared library 'e_sqlite3' exception with net6 rc1 and efcore Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite.Core 6.0.0-rc.1.21452.1 #26163
  • .NET 6 RC2 Entity Framework -> Nullable object must have a value. #26364
    6.0.0
  • [Q] SqlNullabilityProcessor.VisitSqlFunction, Nullability of SUM function #26357
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • No test left behind #26382
  • Improved exception messages #26398
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26399
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [SMALL] Fix to #26357 - [Q] SqlNullabilityProcessor.VisitSqlFunction, Nullability of SUM function #26401

Updated

  • Cache ParamCount together with a statement for SQLite #26380
  • Add Migration name check #26396

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-19
entry.content:

Created

Updated
